name: HYPERTUBE 3021 - LD48
description:
Tube Corp Inc. discovered the HYPERTUBE in 3021. None have found its end. Successful explorers unlock citizenship at the inner sanctum for their entire family.

Will you jump?

---------------------

Hypertube is an infinite faller with progressively harder levels. Pick up speed and dodge floating obstacles. If you can go fast enough you'll warp to the next level.

There are four levels worth of art, after finishing the first four you'll increase the difficulty and start again.
